QuestData.Title: WANTED: Tojek
QuestData.Description:
<The tattered paper appears to include a list of known threats in the area.
The top of the list reads: "Tojek - Direhorn - Responsible for damages to 3 vehicles, 6 supply crates, and the tragic loss of Garrick Blacksteel's mole machine, avoid at all costs."
Perhaps you can hunt down this creature to prevent further attacks.>
